locations.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Headquarters
locations.end_turn: You may discard 1 card from your hand to the bottom of your deck to remove 1 Crisis token from anywhere

locations.name: Stark Labs
locations.end_turn: You may swap 1 card from your hand with 1 of your cards in the Storyline.

locations.name: Central Park
locations.end_turn: You may move up to 2 Civilians or Thugs, in any combination, from this Location to any other Location(s)

locations.name: Avengers Mansion
locations.end_turn: You may draw cards until you have 3 in your hand.

locations.name: Times Square
locations.end_turn: You may rescue 1 Civilian from this Location

locations.name: Avengers Tower
locations.end_turn: You may search your deck for 1 card and set it aside. Then, shuffle your deck and place that card on top

locations.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier
locations.end_turn: You may move to any other Location

locations.name: New York Police Headquarters
locations.end_turn: You may discard 1 Thug from any Location
